name: selenium-javascript-project
description: Selenium WebDriver JavaScript project with secure dependencies

scripts.test:register:headless: set HEADLESS=true&& npx cucumber-js --require tests/step-definitions/**/*.js tests/features/TS01-register.feature
scripts.test:register:headed: set HEADLESS=false&& npx cucumber-js --require tests/step-definitions/**/*.js tests/features/TS01-register.feature
scripts.test:login:headless: set HEADLESS=true&& npx cucumber-js --require tests/step-definitions/**/*.js tests/features/TS02-login.feature
scripts.test:login:headed: set HEADLESS=false&& npx cucumber-js --require tests/step-definitions/**/*.js tests/features/TS02-login.feature
scripts.test:all:headless: set HEADLESS=true&& npx cucumber-js --require tests/step-definitions/**/*.js tests/features/
scripts.test:all:headed: set HEADLESS=false&& npx cucumber-js --require tests/step-definitions/**/*.js tests/features/

author: Shidqi Adiatma
